skillsDescription: work every day as an integral part of out product.  Requirements: 2+ years of industry experience BSc degree in Mathematics/Physics/Computer Science or related field Proven research experience that includes analysis of large data sets Strong background and experience in machine learning and information retrieval Hands-on experience in programming Advantage: PhD/MSc in related field Experience with Python
companyDescription: Fundbox is one of Israel’s fastest growing Fintech startups focused on helping SMB’s with their financial needs.  Fundbox also has an office in the heart of San Francisco.  When you join Fundbox,  you’ll be become an important member in one of the most innovative startups in Fintech.
description: Fundbox is looking for an experienced Data Scientist: To be part of building the brain behind our business.  Help us find innovative solutions to complex problems and be rewarded with a fun and dynamic work environment.  You will: Use your analytical skills to extract valuable insights from our diverse,  rich and rapidly growing data.  Use machine learning and mathematical modeling to build models that help make our business even better.  Work with our engineers and product team to put your models to work every day as an integral part of out product.
